entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `inspectors` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `company` TEXT NOT NULL, `role` TEXT NOT NULL, `signature_image_path` TEXT, `is_active` INTEGER NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

indices.name: index_inspectors_company_name
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_inspectors_company_name` ON `inspectors` (`company`, `name`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
